item.title: Confidence Only Comes From One Place, What You Say to Yourself
item.description: Confidence Only Comes From One Place, What You Say to Yourself References (References:: [[Sports Psychologist Breaks Down the Science of Being Clutch]])

item.title: Effective Self Talk Must Come From Honest Self Reflection
item.description: Effective Self Talk Must Come From Honest Self Reflection Self talk should be reflective of what you actually say confidence. If you say, “I have a great jumper”, what gives you the right to say that?

item.title: Sports Psychologist Breaks Down the Science of Being Clutch
item.description: aliases: Honest Self-Talk Sports Psychologist Breaks Down the Science of Being Clutch [[Effective Self Talk Must Come From Honest Self Reflection]] [[Confidence Only Comes From One Place, What You Say to Yourself]] In contrast to [[Power Poses]] and attempts to make [[Confidence]] come externally, you need to have it come from inside through honest self-talk [[You Control the Narrative]]
